bibl.title: Egypt under the Last Ptolemies. In memory of Sir Eric Turner.
bibl.note: Inaugural Lecture, delivered at University College London on 22 February 1983. - Appendix (pp. 8-10): The Portraits of Ptolemy IX Soter II and Ptolemy X Alexander I.
